scripts.build: cd src/frontend && bun run build && cd ../.. && tsup src/index.ts --format esm --dts --tsconfig ./tsconfig.json

LIVEKIT_API_KEY.description: The plugin requires the following environment variable: LIVEKIT_API_KEY=your_livekit_api_key

LIVEKIT_API_SECRET.description: The plugin requires the following environment variable: LIVEKIT_API_SECRET=your_livekit_api_secret

LIVEKIT_URL.description: The plugin requires the following environment variable: LIVEKIT_URL=your_livekit_server_url

VITE_SERVER_PORT.description: Port number for the local server used to build the API_BASE_URL in the frontend.

VITE_LIVEKIT_URL.description: The LiveKit WebSocket server URL used by the client to establish voice chat connections.

VITE_API_BASE_URL.description: Base URL for API requests used by the Vite front-end.

SERVER_PORT.description: Port number where the backend server is expected to run; used to set import.meta.env.VITE_SERVER_PORT for the client.

LIVEKIT_ENABLE_TURN_DETECTION.description: Enable or disable voice turn detection logic in LiveKitService. Set to 'false' to disable; otherwise turn detection is enabled.

LIVEKIT_SILENCE_THRESHOLD.description: Audio energy threshold below which audio is considered silence during voice activity detection.

LIVEKIT_SPEECH_THRESHOLD.description: Audio energy threshold above which audio is considered speech during voice activity detection.

LIVEKIT_MIN_SPEECH_DURATION.description: Minimum duration in milliseconds that speech must last to be considered a valid speech segment.

LIVEKIT_MAX_SPEECH_DURATION.description: Maximum duration in milliseconds allowed for a single speech segment before it is automatically cut off.

LIVEKIT_DEBOUNCE_THRESHOLD.description: Time in milliseconds used to debounce between speech segments, preventing rapid toggling between speaking and silence.

LIVEKIT_SILENCE_FRAMES_REQUIRED.description: Number of consecutive silence frames required to classify the end of speech.

LIVEKIT_SPEECH_FRAMES_REQUIRED.description: Number of consecutive speech frames required to classify the start of speech.

LIVEKIT_SAMPLE_RATE.description: Sample rate in hertz used for audio processing and resampling operations.

LIVEKIT_CHANNELS.description: Number of audio channels (1 for mono, 2 for stereo) used in audio processing.

LIVEKIT_FRAME_SIZE.description: Number of samples per audio frame used during audio capture and processing.
